description: This file defines a React functional component named 'NotesList' which renders a searchable list of notes. It handles filtering notes based on a search query, rendering different empty or no results states, and managing user interactions such as selecting a note.

methods.name: NotesList({ notes = [], selectedId = null, onSelect, searchable = true, searchQuery = '', onSearch, onClearSearch, emptyMessage = 'No notes yet. Create a new note to get started.', notFoundMessage = 'No notes match your search.', ariaLabel = 'Notes list', })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a list of notes with search and selection capabilities.

ctags.name: NotesList
